title: How to Figure Out the Covid-19 Tests You Need for Air Travel
sub_head: Travelers have to get tested within one day of their flights; here is what else has changed
body:
The rules for flying into the U.S. have changed yet again.
International travelers including U.S. citizens coming into the country by air now must have a negative Covid-19 test within a day of departure, regardless of vaccination status. Previously, fully vaccinated travelers could have a negative test within the three days before departing for the U.S. The requirements donâ€™t apply to people entering the country by land or sea.
